title: University of Exeter News - Page 5 of 7 - SciTechDaily
cleaned_text: Amazon Rock Art Shows the Rainforest's Earliest Inhabitants Living With Giant Ice Age Animals](https://scitechdaily.com/sistine-chapel-of-the-ancients-discovered-amazon-rock-art-shows-the-rainforests-earliest-inhabitants-living-with-giant-ice-age-animals/) Amazonian rock art newly discovered by researchers provides further proof the rainforest's earliest inhabitants lived alongside now-extinct giant Ice Age animals. The thousands of pictures...
